page.title: 01GAZETTEER TO BISHOPTON
page.content: This block contains most of the village of Bishopton, a number of mixed farms and about half of the block is occupied by the Royal Ordnance Factory, Bishopton, which is inaccessible to the public. Bishopton has a railway station, 3 bus services and is close to the motorway system and Glasgow Airport. It is largely a dormitory town for nearby Paisley, Renfrew, Glasgow and Greenock. It has a modest number of shops and minimal services, but a fair number of thriving sport and leisure groups.
